text: Paul-Jean Hérault, pseudonym of Michel Rigaud, (22 September 1934 – 26 October 2020) was a French writer and journalist. He worked for Paris-Presse, Candide, L'Aurore, Paris Jour, RTL, and Télé Star. Hérault died of a stroke in Paris on 26 October 2020 at the age of 86. ==References== Category:1934 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Deaths from stroke Category:French novelists Category:French journalists Category:Writers from Paris
title: Paul-Jean Hérault
